product_name: Zipp 202 Firecrest Carbon Clincher Wheel - Rear
long_description: Made to aid you in your pursuit of speed, the stiff, light and aerodynamic Zipp 202 Firecrest Carbon Clincher Rear Wheel offers fast-accelerating fun and versatility for any road you ride.
